Description: Run a Turing Machine based on 2-letter combinations. Tags: 2-letter, binary, cardboard
Name: Busy Beaver

Souvenir.Explanation: When not in legacy mode, Souvenir could ask about the initial tape or the final displayed tape before it gets blanked out. Souvenir could ask about the displayed letters for each stage. This is disambiguated by the displayed letters in some stage.
